meanings.definition: The faculty by which the mind stores and remembers information.
meanings.sent1: My memory helps me remember important dates.
meanings.sent2: Her memory of the event was crystal clear.
meanings.sent3: I have a terrible memory, I always forget where I put my keys.
meanings.sent4: The memory of her smile brightened his day.
meanings.sent5: The memory of his first bike ride stayed with him forever.

meanings.sent1: The old photo brought back a sweet memory.
meanings.sent2: His memories of childhood are filled with laughter.
meanings.sent3: Finding his favorite childhood toy brought back a flood of memories.
meanings.sent4: The memory of her voice lingered in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The memory of their first meeting still makes her smile.

meanings.definition: The capacity of a computer to store and retrieve data.
meanings.sent1: The computer's memory allows it to run multiple programs.
meanings.sent2: Upgrading the memory of the computer improved its performance.
meanings.sent3: The computer's memory seemed to have a mind of its own, storing random files.
meanings.sent4: The memory of the computer was like a vast library of information.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the device was crucial for processing large amounts of data.
